children: Unpainted and untreated wood goes in the food and yard waste:
All pieces must be less than 4 inches in diameter and under 4 feet long.
Remove nails and all other non-wood materials.
Break lumber and boards down so they fit in your bin with the lid closed.
Painted or treated wood goes in the garbage:
All pieces must be less than 4 inches in diameter and under 4 feet long.
Break lumber and boards down so they fit in your bin with the lid closed.
Lumber or boards which do not fit in your bin with the lid closed may be put in a plastic bag and placed next to your garbage bin on collection day. {{proj[4].rate_text}}
